articles.content:
DPRK, China Cooperate in Documentary Field 
    Beijing, August 13 (KCNA) -- An agreement on cooperation in documentary field was signed here on Aug. 12 between the DPRK State Archive Bureau and the State Archive Administration of China.
 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were members of a delegation of the State Archive Bureau led by Director Jon Song Guk and from the Chinese side were the director general of the State Archive Administration and officials concerned.
 The agreement was inked by Jon Song Guk and the director general of the Chinese administration.

Pulikovski and His Party Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung 
    Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Konstantin Borisovich Pulikovski, presidential envoy to the Far East Federal District of Russia, and his party laid a floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill here on Sunday.
 Present at the ceremony of laying the basket were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK Kung Sok Ung and officials concerned and Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Andrei Karlov and embassy officials.    
 The participants placed the basket of flowers in the name of Pulikovski before the statue and made bows with their deep reverence for Kim Il Sung who performed great exploits for the times and history and made undying contributions to the human cause of independence and the development of the friendly relations between the peoples of the DPRK and Russia.

articles.title: DPRK-Cambodia Inter-governmental Plan Inked
Pulikovski and His Party Arrive
articles.content:
DPRK-Cambodia Inter-governmental Plan Inked 
    Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- A 2005-2007 plan for cultural exchange between the governments of the DPRK and Cambodia was signed at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Sunday.
 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were Jon Hyon Chan, vice-chairman of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned and from the opposite side members of the Cambodian government cultural delegation led by Prince Sisowath Kulachad, secretary of State in the Ministry of Culture and Fine Art and the charge d'affaires of Cambodia here.
 The plan was inked by Jon Hyon Chan and Sisowath Kulachad.

articles.title: All-out Anti-U.S. Resistance for Independence Called for
articles.content:
Pulikovski and His Party Arrive 
    Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Konstantin Borisovich Pulikovski, presidential envoy to the Far East Federal District of Russia, and his party arrived here on Sunday for a visit  to the DPRK to attend the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
 They were met at the airport by Vice-Chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission Yon Hyong Muk, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kung Sok Ung and officials concerned and Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Andrei Karlov and embassy officials.

articles.content:
Congratulations to Fidel Castro Ruz
    Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il, together with Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a congratulatory message to Fidel Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State, today on the occasion of his 79th birthday.
 The message sincerely wished him greater success in his responsible work for the socialist cause and the well-being of the people and good health and happiness.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
President of Washington Times Corporation Here
    Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- President of the Washington Times Corporation Joo Dong Mun arrived here Saturday. 
 He was accompanied by Pak Sang Gwon, managing director of the Pyonghwa General Motor Corporation who is secretary general of the World Peace Federation.
 They were greeted at the airport by Ri Jong Hyok, vice-chairman of the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Keynote Report at World Conference for Support to Korea's Reunification

Russian Delegation Arrives
    Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of war veteran lawmakers of Russia led by Vasilii Klyuchenok, first vice-chairman of the Defence and Security Committee of the Federation Council of Russia, arrived here Saturday.
 It was greeted at the airport by an official concerned and the Russian ambassador to the DPRK.
